channel.title: Rajavanya's Digital Garden
channel.description: Last 10 notes on Rajavanya's Digital Garden

item.title: Real-world example of using a reddit thread to make marketing materials
item.description: Today I accidentally generated a good marketing email using comments on a Reddit thread. Where is it applicable? You have a product/service that differs from the status quo, but you’re struggling to communicate it with your marketing.

item.title: index
item.description: So I’m guessing this file needs to be manually edited, like an obsidian homepage, but for the public. A recent files list doesn’t make sense, as the concept of a garden is to link every note you make in some order to a root.
